properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 16.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ  FROM S/V KAPALAI,
TWO PERSONS ON BOARD, LOSS OF STEERING
AND TAKING ON WATER IN 20-26.6N 060-33.7W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RSC SAN JUAN,
PHONE: 787 289 2042,
E-MAIL: SSJCC@USCG.MIL.
